function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate HVAC services leading to different comfort zones and potential spread of contagious diseases in the built environment.","Impact":"Risk of discomfort and potential spread of contagious diseases due to inadequate ventilation and air circulation.","Mitigation":"Ensure proper HVAC services are in place to maintain consistent and appropriate indoor air quality and temperature. Implement air purification systems to remove pathogens from the air.","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purification systems, natural ventilation systems.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, staff, students, and faculty.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, maintenance personnel."},{"Description":"Lack of capacity regulations in educational buildings during COVID-19 alert levels, potentially leading to overcrowding and increased risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to overcrowding and lack of social distancing in educational buildings.","Mitigation":"Implement strict capacity regulations based on COVID-19 alert levels. Use technology to monitor and manage building occupancy levels.","Technologies":"Building occupancy management systems, real-time monitoring tools, communication systems for notifying occupants.","People":"Students, faculty, staff, visitors.","Owner":"Educational institutions, health and safety officials, facility managers."},{"Description":"Inadequate protection of interior surfaces from water, heat, moisture, and abrasion, potentially leading to mold growth and indoor air quality issues.","Impact":"Risk of mold growth, degradation of indoor air quality, and potential respiratory health issues due to inadequate protection of interior surfaces.","Mitigation":"Select and apply finishing materials that are resistant to water, heat, moisture, and abrasion. Implement regular inspection and maintenance of interior surfaces to prevent mold growth.","Technologies":"Resilient and moisture-resistant finishing materials, mold-resistant coatings, humidity and moisture monitoring systems.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, staff, students, and faculty.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, maintenance personnel."}]}
